div.h2: Learn how Rebound's Icepoint® technology can benefit your cold chain facility.

div.p: FPS is referring to Freeze Point Suppression. This cycle operates by changing the chemical composition of a refrigerant. In the case of IcePoint
Pure water is frozen into ice at the most economical time of the day and stored in a tank.
A freeze suppressant, in the form of a non-chloride salt, is then injected into the bottom of the tank, mixing with the ice, which creates a -25°F refrigerant. .
This refrigerant mixture is then used to maintain freezer temperatures by absorbing the heat and humidity from the freezer space.
Water is then separated from the freeze point suppressant generating pure water ready for freezing and concentrated FPS ready to send back to the ice tank.
FPS is referring to Freeze Point Suppression. This cycle operates by changing the chemical composition of a refrigerant. In the case of IcePoint

MVR is a thermal separation technology optimized for energy efficiency. Like all distillation processes, water is boiled out of the salt-water brine. To increase the energy efficiency, the heat is recaptured and repurposed to help boil additional water.
IcePoint® uses a standard MVR architecture refreshed with state of the art compression technology.

Like all refrigeration equipment, IcePoint
®
must conserve energy and meet fundamental efficiency limits. All refrigeration equipment requires some form of driving energy input to move heat from a low temperature to a high one. For IcePoint

div.p: Maintain production line speed and blast cycle times regardless of product, packaging, or pallet characteristics.
Eliminate evaporator frost-up by controlling moisture levels in freezers. Extract warm, moist air and re-inject it very cold and very dry.
Accelerate freezing, reduce pathogens, and meet the changing needs of your facility with 100% USDA approved materials.

section.class: elementor-section elementor-inner-section elementor-element elementor-element-917a14c elementor-section-full_width elementor-section-height-default elementor-section-height-default

div.p: Improve employ productivity and safety with a frost-free facility.
Supercharge existing vapor compression capacity with no critical ammonia system tie-in.
No down time required and equipment can be placed outside your facility with simple ductwork integration
